edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries
Class RequirementRelationshipDisplay

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries.RequirementRelationshipDisplay

public class RequirementRelationshipDisplay
extends java.lang.Object

Used to display any alternatives that refer to a specific requirement. This is a pop-up menu from the requirement. This was initially based off the TableViewer example in an Eclipse Corner article - see the RationaleTaskList code for more details.

Nested Class Summary
(package private)  class RequirementRelationshipDisplay.RequirementRelationship
          Inner class that holds our requirement relationship.
(package private)  class RequirementRelationshipDisplay.RequirementRelationshipContentProvider
          InnerClass that acts as a proxy for the RequirementRelationshipList providing content for the Table.

(package private)  class RequirementRelationshipDisplay.RequirementRelationshipSorter
          Used to sort our relationship table when we click on a column header
